summary.para: Returns the client's current cross-origin policy to apply to the download session.

param.name: pPolicy
param.para: A value indicating the client's current cross-origin policy to apply to the download session.

summary.para: Returns the W3C origin of the HTML5 media element.

param.name: wszSourceOrigin
param.para: The W3C origin of the HTML5 media element.

remarks.para: Use CoTaskMemFree to free the string.

summary.para: Returns true when the specified URL has the same origin as the HTML5 media element.
Implemented by clients that want to enforce a cross origin policy for HTML5 media downloads.

remarks.para: The Media Foundation network code uses these client callbacks to implement and enforce cross origin downloads.
